revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: The Construction and Principal Uses of Mathematical Instruments. Translated form the French of M. Bion, Cheif Instrument-Maker to the French King. (By Nicolas Bion..."
revision.text: Possibly: The Construction and Principal Uses of Mathematical Instruments. Translated form the French of M. Bion, Cheif Instrument-Maker to the French King. (By Nicolas Bion, translated by Edmund Stone). (London : Printed for J. Richardson, in Pater-noster-Row, M.DCC.LVIII. [1758]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2089317~S1
